title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8191-2.5 - Information to be supplied by New York City
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8191-2.5 - Information to be supplied by New York City

State Regulations

At least once every calendar quarter, the Commissioner of

Finance shall provide to ORPTS a report of sales of real property located in

New York City. Such report shall be as current as practicable and prepared on
the basis of documents prescribed under chapter 21 of title 11 of the

Administrative Code of the City of New York, and for each sale shall contain as
much of the information set forth in section
8191-2.1
(a) of this Subpart as is set forth in such documents. Such report or an additional
report also shall contain an indication of whether, as of the date of sale, such property was subject to an assessment limitation prescribed in section
1805 (1)
of the Real

Property Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8191-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
